name: Ghost Ship
text:
Careful, this one only does one way trips!

Complete Faelin's Book of Heroes.

name: Garona
text:
The opponent will never see your next play coming with this card back.

Obtained by purchasing from the shop.

name: Celestial Starlight
text:
Fight evil by starlight, and win games with your might!

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, August 2022.

name: Driftwood
text:
Put in the work, and you'll get this drift!

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, July 2022.
